Author: amazes.co
Title: test
Body: Reindeer The World's First Cloud Design Platform  Website | Whitepaper | ANN Thread | Facebook | Twitter | Linkedin | Telegram | Trello | Medium | Reddit | Github   TOTAL BOUNTY BUDGET: 500,000 RDT (1 RDT =  0.001 ETH)  BOUNTY POOL ALLOCATION: ► Signature campaign - 20% ► Content Campaign - 20% ► Translation and Moderation Campaign - 5% ► Twitter campaign - 15% ► Facebook campaign - 15% ► Linkedin Campaign - 5% ► Reddit - 5% ► Telegram campaign - 10% ► Facebook Community Group Campaign - 5%   General Rules • All bounty participants are required to join Reindeer Telegram group to receive reward at the end of the campaign: https://t.me/ReindeerProject • For Bounty Related Question Join here: https://t.me/amazes_services • Must have to join both telegram channels. • Weekly round ends every Sunday. • Submit Weekly report every Sunday (before 23:59 Forum Time).  NOTE: Don't Quote your previous week report, make a new post every week. • The using of several accounts, any cheating, spamming, unethical behavior, or relying on someone else to do the work will disqualify you from any of the bounties. • Inactive User will not be accepted. • If your rank during the campaign just knock me on telegram or message me here.   Bounty will run for 8 weeks  Week 1 ► 17th December - 23rd December = Running Week 2 ► 24th December - 30th December = Week 3 ► 31st December - 6th January = Week 4 ► 7th January - 13th January = Week 5 ► 14th January - 20th January = Week 6 ► 21st January - 27th January = Week 7 ► 28th January - 3rd February = Week 8 ► 4th February - 10th February =   Weekly Stake Rate Jr. Member: 1 stake per week Member: 2.5 stakes per week Full Member: 4 stakes per week Senior Member: 6 stakes per week Hero Member: 8 stakes per week Legendary: 10 stakes per week  Rules: Participants in this campaign have to be at least a Jr. Member to be eligible for registration. All members need to post at least 7 posts each week having our signature to be eligible for a reward All posts must be made in “Alternate cryptocurrencies” or “Trading Discussion” sections of the forum. Posts in bounty announcement thread will not count. Spam is strictly prohibited. Users found spamming will be immediately and permanently disqualified, reported to the moderators, and banned from any other bounty campaign Using multiple signatures at the same time is prohibited. Participants with a negative trust are not allowed. You are not allowed to use another site's avatar. Users are not allowed to change their signature in the middle of the campaign. Posts should be at least 75 characters long Low Quality posts are not accepted Participants with high quality post will get additional stakes as bonus  How to Participate JOIN Reindeer official [/url]  [url=https://github.com/reindeer-project] [u] [glow=#DC143C,1] [color=#fff]GITHUB [/u] [/url][/td][/tr][/table][/center]      CONTENT BOUNTY  We are looking for bloggers, journalists, and video content creators who are willing to write about REINDEER project and our upcoming ICO. All content should be unique and original. Not for Medium, Steemit (Golos).  Stake Rate: Video content reward (depends on quality and users engagement): 15 – 35 – 50 stakes or more. Written content reward (depends on quality and users engagement): 10 – 20 – 30 stakes or more.  Minimum requirements: For video bloggers (youtubers) - you must have at least 350 subscribers on your Youtube channel where you’re going to publish content For written content makers - articles must be posted on platforms/websites with minimum 1000 daily (platform) visitors When make each post you should include the official website: https://reindeer.tech and Telegram group: https://t.me/ReindeerProject   BLOG BOUNTY  Blog bounty will be distributed between the creators of small posts, reposts, press releases and other posts and articles about REINDEER project (300+ words). Sites like Medium, Steemit (Golos) or Telegram channels are in this section.  Stake Rate: Posting original content to your own blog (depends on quality and users engagement): 10-15-20 stakes Repost+rewrite non-original article (created by project team) in your blog: 3 stakes Share it in FB or tweet: 1 stake per share  Restrictions: Spam, abuse, Google translation, copying of another participant’s submitted material.  Terms and conditions: Article must be freely accessible during the campaign When make each post you should include the official website: https://reindeer.tech and Telegram group: https://t.me/ReindeerProject All content must be original, you can submit articles from Steemit, Medium, Personal Blogs, and other high quality article submission for crypto sites. Absolutely NO COPY PASTE from one platform to another even if you own the article.   How to Participate JOIN Auto Block official telegram group: https://t.me/ReindeerProject Fill out this form to participate: FORM LINK       Translation campaign rules: Using Google Translate and other online translators is not allowed. Participants using Google Translate will be instantly disqualified There can be reserved only one translation per one participant Applications for the translations to multiple languages will not be accepted Only one translation per language will be accepted Low quality translations will not be accepted and will not be rewarded  Stake Rate: REINDEER ICO ANN thread translation: 10 stakes Translation of the REINDEER White paper to your language: 50 stakes Translation of the REINDEER Website to your language: 20 stakes Translation of other materials like press releases, articles, etc: 10 stakes Moderation/Management ANN: 1 Stake per Valid post  Languages Needed As Of Now Turkish Arabic Russian Chines Japanese Thailand Vietnam Hindi Filipino  How to Participate JOIN Auto Block official telegram group: https://t.me/ReindeerProject Fill out this form to participate: FORM LINK       Weekly Stake Rate: 300 to 999 followers: 1 stakes per/Week 1000 to 4999 followers: 3 stakes/Week 5000 or more followers: 10 stakes/Week  Terms and Conditions: 1: Twitter account must have a minimum of 350 followers. 2: Your audit score must be more than 90%. 3: Twitter accounts must be original. Fake, dead, inactive and bot accounts will not be accepted. 4: Participants must be active and regular Twitter users, and must be retweeting/sharing The Auto Block official tweets and updates. 5: You must Retweet at least 7 tweets from Reindeer Official Twitter Account in a week with #reindeer #ICO #ReindeerICO (maximum 2 RTs a day). If you comment on the tweet     you retweet you will receive bonus 2 stakes. 6: You must create at least 3 Personal tweet with #reindeer #ICO #ReindeerICO within the week. Max 1 personal tweet per day; Only quality tweets will be counted 7: All posts must contain #reindeer #ICO #ReindeerICO 8: Joining with multiple accounts is not allowed. Users found to be using multi accounts, will be blacklisted. 9: Submit Weekly report every Sunday (before 23:59 Forum Time).  NOTE: Don't Quote your previous week report, make a new post every week. 10: Terms and Condition can be changed or more can be applied. Personal Tweet Links: 1. 2. 3.  Comment Links: 1. 2. 3. Inactive, fake and bots accounts will not be accepted. 3: You must Like and Share at least 7 post from Reindeer official facebook page with #reindeer #ICO #ReindeerICO Max 2 Shares per day, Burst share will not be counted. Publically use the ‘Recommend’ tab in an official Facebook page. If you comment on the post you share, will receive bonus 2 stakes. 4: You must create at least 3 Personal Post with #reindeer #ICO #ReindeerICO within the week. Max 1 personal post per day; Only quality post will be counted 5: All posts must contain #reindeer #ICO #ReindeerICO 6: Joining with multiple accounts is not allowed. Personal Post Links: 1. 2. 3.  Comment Links: 1. 2. 3.     Weekly Stake Rate: Make comments: 1 Stake per comment Upvote each post: 0.5 Stake per comment Make a post - depends on upvotes: 10 upvotes = 2.5 Stakes, 20 upvotes = 5 Stakes, 50 upvotes = 10 Stakes, 100 upvotes = 25 Stakes, 300 upvotes = 50 Stakes Bonus stakes will be awarded when comments or posts have at least 5 upvotes.  Restrictions: Multiple accounts registrations, spam, abuse and insults. Reddit accounts with negative trust are not eligible. Posts and Comments with negative Karma will not be accepted.  Terms and conditions: For a post to be counted, it needs to be posted in one of the cryptocurrency related subreddits like: r/bitcoin, r/Qtum, r/icocrypto, r/cryptocurrency or another. Report differ from this example won’t be counted. No report - no stakes (weekly, monthly reports won’t be counted)  How to Participate Follow the official REINDEER page on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/reindeer_press/ JOIN Reindeer official telegram group: https://t.me/ReindeerProject Fill out this form to participate: FORM LINK  Use Format Below for Submission of Report Code: Bitcointalk Username: Reddit Link: Spreadsheet No.: Week Number:  Link to your posts: 1. 2. 3. etc..     Weekly Stake Rate: Less than 500 followers: 1 stakes per Week 501 to 1000 followers: 3 stakes per/Week 1000 or more followers: 10 stakes per/Week  Terms and Conditions: 1: LinkedIn account must have a minimum of 350 followers/connections. 2: Your account must have a valid profile photo along with details of your professional background (complete profile). 3: LinkedIn accounts must be original. Fake, dead, inactive and bot accounts will not be accepted. 4: Participants must be active and regular users. 5: You need to make 3 posts and share our posts 2 times a week. You can also share Reindeer news posted on different sites, e.g. Coinidol, Cryptocoinnews, coinspeaker, the Merkle etc. 6: All posts must contain #reindeer #ICO #ReindeerICO and You must add the website https://reindeer.tech with the post you make. 7: Joining with multiple accounts is not allowed. Users found to be using multi accounts, will be blacklisted. 8: Terms and Conditions can be changed or more can be applied.
